mapper.insert: MERGE INTO alarm USING (SELECT * FROM DUAL) ON (child_id = #{childId} AND alarm_date = to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd')) WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (alarm_id, parent_id, child_id, alarm_message, alarm_date, alarm_checked) VALUES (alarmSeq.nextval, #{parentId}, #{childId}, #{alarmMessage}, to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd'), 'no')
INSERT INTO ALARM (alarm_id, parent_id, alarm_message, alarm_date, alarm_checked) VALUES(alarmSeq.nextval, #{parentId}, #{alarmMessage}, SYSDATE, 'no')
mapper.update: UPDATE Alarm SET alarm_checked = 'yes' WHERE parent_id = #{parentId} AND alarm_checked = 'no'
mapper.select: SELECT alarm_id AS "alarmId", parent_id AS "parentId", alarm_message AS "alarmMessage", alarm_date AS "alarmDate", alarm_checked AS "alarmChecked" FROM ALARM WHERE parent_id=#{parentId} ORDER BY alarm_date DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Alarm WHERE parent_id = #{parentId} AND alarm_checked = 'no'
